name: 賴名亮
objective:
本課程將在專利法的基礎上，以案例為教材進行討論，案例包含電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查和其他個案研討。
This course will be based on patent law and will use cases as teaching materials for discussion. The cases include patent application review for computer software, medicine, biology, Chinese herbal medicine, as well as prosecution issues and other special cases.
